userStories.title: Create src/state/status.ts with showStatus function that displays project progress from project.json
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Function exports showStatus(projectPath), loads project.json, displays: project name, phases with status (pending/planned/executing/complete), current position, counts of completed vs total phases

userStories.title: Wire status command in cli.ts to call showStatus
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: case 'status' in cli.ts imports and calls showStatus, displays formatted progress report

userStories.title: Fix auto-detect mode: when project.json exists and no command given, show status instead of error
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Running ./marge.sh with project.json present (and no prd.json) shows status and suggests next action (plan/execute/verify) instead of 'not implemented' error

userStories.title: Test status command and auto-detect: run ./marge.sh and ./marge.sh status with project.json
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: ./marge.sh status displays progress, ./marge.sh (auto-detect) shows status and next action, typecheck passes: bunx tsc --noEmit
